channel.title: Server online then offline?
channel.description: Ahh, fixed, sorry!!! Didn't know when I reset router it removes the portforwarding. THANKS I LOVE YOU ALL!! My serber fixeded <3

item.title: Server online then offline?
item.dc:creator: @iPaelex iPaelex
item.description:
@iPaelex wrote:

If you give your pc a static ip so it defaults to lets say 192.168.1.2 every time and you use the save and reboot featre with your router it wont change, your ports will stay forwarded and you wont have to keep changing it. the static ip is done pc sided
